@chickenlj  PTAL，THKS

客户端增加如下配置：
```properties
dubbo.consumer.check=false
```
Nacos document related to auth: https://nacos.io/en-us/blog/nacos%201.2.0%20guide.html

POM.xml依赖如下：
    <dependency>
      <groupId>org.apache.dubbo</groupId>
      <artifactId>dubbo</artifactId>
      <version>2.7.6</version>
    </dependency>

    <dependency>
      <groupId>org.apache.curator</groupId>
      <artifactId>curator-framework</artifactId>
      <version>2.8.0</version>
    </dependency>
    <dependency>
      <groupId>org.apache.curator</groupId>
      <artifactId>curator-recipes</artifactId>
      <version>2.8.0</version>
    </dependency>
问题因该是由于zookeeper上的数据同步太慢导致的，当共有2个服务情况下，停止一个然后重启，此时zookeeper长时间保持为3个服务，此时消费者负载均衡就会发生错误。
@chickenlj 大佬看看
想明白了，如果不注释掉，可能导致正常配置了generic=true,但是isGeneric位置在getGeneric后面，isGeneric方法把generic参数覆盖成null了。这样无论注释与否，都会存在一个问题，应该在put的时候判断一下key是否存在，再进行put
@mercyblitz 小马哥看看

spring-boot will do extra work when doing package. but for dubbo, it's only a framework and works via library. also dubbo doesn't have gradle plugin or maven plugin (dubbo doesn't need too).

Could you share more detail what do you expect for this docker image? or what's the issue this image will solve?

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/46589466/82331792-2f7f0400-9a17-11ea-9eb2-68e08ce6c290.png)
描述：2020-05-19 21:23:41.300 ERROR 15164 --- [nio-8001-exec-3] o.a.c.c.C.[.[.[/].[dispatcherServlet]    : Servlet.service() for servlet [dispatcherServlet] in context with path [] threw exception [Request processing failed; nested exception is org.apache.dubbo.rpc.RpcException: Failed to invoke the method signOut in the service net.chain.test.service.LoginService. No provider available for the service net.chain.test.service.LoginService from registry localhost:9090 on the consumer 192.168.222.2 using the dubbo version 2.7.1. Please check if the providers have been started and registered.] with root cause

客户端添加以下配置：dubbo.consumer.check=false  启动时可以启动的。但是消费的时候就会报错！

org.apache.dubbo.rpc.RpcException: Failed to invoke the method signOut in the service net.chain.test.service.LoginService. No provider available for the service net.chain.test.service.LoginService from registry localhost:9090 on the consumer 192.168.222.2 using the dubbo version 2.7.1. Please check if the providers have been started and registered.
@chickenlj

我这里确认下你遇到的问题。是先启动客户端，然后启动服务端，然后客户端调用失败吗？

报错信息是说没有可用的服务提供者，想确认下这个时候有服务提供者注册到注册中心吗？

可以用 `getObjectAttachments()` 替换的吧？
（`getAttachments()`已经被标记为 `Deprecated`）
i have the same problem in dubbo 2.7.7

> 可以用 `getObjectAttachments()` 替换的吧？
> （`getAttachments()`已经被标记为 `Deprecated`）

可以用这个替换，老项目没法一次性替换完成，只能保持兼容

In my opinion `AdaptiveClassCodeGenerator` is a util that provide widely applicable capabilities and `consumerUrl` is totally a business attributes. I don't think changing util to adapt a specific problem is a good idea. This may make util and specific usage so coupled and make the util's code looks weird.
Also, SPI provides the capability of custom adaptive extension. In #5985, I have customized an adaptive extension to adapt `Cluster`.

> 我遇到了相同的问题 dubbo2.7.6
> 官网描述：
> 降级约定
> request.tag=tag1 时优先选择 标记了tag=tag1 的 provider。若集群中不存在与请求标记对应的服务，默认将降级请求
> tag为空的provider；如果要改变这种默认行为，即找不到匹配tag1的provider返回异常，需设置request.tag.force=true。
>
> request.tag未设置时，只会匹配tag为空的provider。即使集群中存在可用的服务，若 tag
> 不匹配也就无法调用，这与约定1不同，携带标签的请求可以降级访问到无标签的服务，但不携带标签/携带其他种类标签的请求永远无法访问到其他标签的服务。
>
> 目前现象： request.tag未设置时，匹配到有tag的provider
